title: Yes, it’s real: Trump is collapsing. Can the MAGA faithful save him?
description: Even Republicans are unhappy with Trump's vicious, failing agenda. That doesn't mean they're ready to bail
content: At least since the Republican Party suffered a comprehensive defeat in last months off-year elections, Donald Trumps public support has been spiraling downward even faster than before. A new YouGov/E… [+10099 chars]
